p: It is also important to remember that oral administration of Ca hydroxyapatite microcrystals can accelerate fracture healing and repair and even prevent osteoporosis [ 218]. Moreover, Zhang et al. [ 219] described the benefit of nanohydroxyapatite/CS composite for bone regeneration when it was administered by injection. In addition, these nanocomposites showed antistaphylococcal activity [ 220].
